channel.title: Iomega on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Iomega on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: An Annoying Clicking Sound
item.description: Today in Tedium: As proprietary, non-standardized formats go, Iomega’s Zip drive got a heck of a lot further than most of its competitors. It managed to improve on a format people were used to (the old floppy) just enough that it ensured it’d gain popularity. It fit niches for people who had to share a lot of data. And it even had a sizable base of home users—which was impressive for its time.
